entries.name: add_nonce(nonce = nil) → requestclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Adds a nonce to the OCSP request.  If no nonce is given a random one will be generated.

entries.name: certid → [certificate_id, ...]click to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns all certificate IDs in this request.

entries.name: check_nonce(response) → resultclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Checks the nonce validity for this request and response.

entries.name: sign(cert, key, certs = nil, flags = 0, digest = nil) → selfclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Signs this OCSP request using cert, key and optional digest. If digest is not specified, SHA-1 is used. certs is an optional Array of additional certificates which are included in the request in addition to the signer certificate. Note that if certs is nil or not given, flag OpenSSL::OCSP::NOCERTS is enabled. Pass an empty array to include only the signer certificate.

entries.name: signed? → true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the request is signed, false otherwise. Note that the validity of the signature is not checked. Use verify to verify that.

entries.name: to_der()
entries.desc: Returns this request as a DER-encoded string

entries.name: verify(certificates, store, flags = 0) → true or falseclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Verifies this request using the given certificates and store. certificates is an array of OpenSSL::X509::Certificate, store is an OpenSSL::X509::Store.
